Instance.description: Interaction that constrains an actor sim relative to the targeted pond.

TunableVariant.name: constraint_type
TunableVariant.description: The type of constraint to use.

Tunable.name: max_water_depth
Tunable.description: The maximum water depth required for the sim to stand when running this interaction. This is capped at the maximum possible wading depth since swimming in ponds is not currently supported, and having a large allowed water depth range will impact performance.

Tunable.name: min_water_depth
Tunable.description: The minimum water depth required for the sim to stand when running this interaction. Please note that the pond edges are based on water tiles, which may be partially covered by terrain. Because of that, this must be at least 0.1 if you want the sim to stand inside the pond.
